GapFillInput.Title: Nationalities
GapFillInput.Instruction: Write the nationalities. Type the answers in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Rosella is from Italy. She’s Italian.
2. Chen is from China. He’s Chinese.
3. Sun is from Korea. She’s Korean.
4. Jean-Luc is from France. He’s French.
5. Ramon is from Spain. He’s Spanish.
6. Ana is from Turkey. She’s Turkish.
7. Linda is from the USA. She’s American.
8. Lynn is from Australia. She’s Australian.
9. Marta is from Poland. She’s Polish.
10. Greg is from Britain. He’s British.
11. Svetlana is from Russia. She’s Russian.
12. Hiro is from Japan. He’s Japanese.
